infoDescription: The highest levels of care with the latest technology... matching
infoSecDescription: the level of luxury and technological excellence of Tesla cars.
infoTime: From Saturday to Thursday from 9 am to 5 pm
servicesDescription: Your car deserves the utmost care from a workshop specialized in repairing and servicing cars of all kinds, where the experience extended over many years and the quality of work that cannot be competed through the most modern equipment in Jerusalem.
serCard1Description: Provide your car with maintenance and repair services that include batteries, electrical systems, wiring, lighting, and electronic devices.
serCard2Description: We handle all types of problems using high-quality spare parts and the latest technology.
serCard3Description: Our specialized technicians provide various services, including battery inspection and testing, as well as maintenance and replacement.
serCard4Description: We inspect critical components like the compressor, condenser, ventilation systems, and check/refill the refrigerant level.
serCard5Description: Your car is in safe hands with AHM. We specialize in car accident maintenance service.
ourWorksDescription: Welcome to the world of accuracy and quality! The management of AHM Car Maintenance Company looks forward to being the first company in the city of Jerusalem to enjoy distinguished services according to international standards and a reliable partner for all car owners. We promise you a unique experience and an exceptional journey when you visit us.
aboutUsDescription: Over the past few years we have had the privilege of dealing with a range of amazing clients
aboutUsCardDescription1: I got my car serviced by A.H.M Unlimited Services today and they exceeded my expectations with the quality and range of services including car collection and delivery to home service.Professional and efficient service.
aboutUsCardDescription2:
That's a great garage. 
Amazing service very professional.
Kind people.Thank you very much
aboutUsCardDescription3: I am one of the company's subscribers, and I find the company to be one of the best companies that provide service here in Jerusalem. It is highly recommended to share this experience and the service that I received, which is more than wonderful. Thank you. Khalil Khwais
aboutUsCardDescription4: More than wonderful and reasonable prices
aboutUsCardDescription5: All respect to him. This company respects precise appointments and reasonable prices for everyone
aboutUsCardDescription6: May God bless you with high-quality treatment, fast service and reasonable prices. Good luck
contactUsDescription: We appreciate your interest in our services. To book a maintenance appointment within AHM, please provide us with the required details in the form below.
fDescription: What we assure you is that you can fully rely on our team for auto repair and maintenance services that are provided with high quality and at very reasonable prices for what you get, whether your car is new or old, whether you need scheduled maintenance or require extensive work, of course, we have more than decades. Our experience in retail makes it easy for us to handle all of our customers' vehicle situations.
